hints.label: rem-simplified-vs-full-final
hints.title: Simplified vs Full Model
hints.content:
5048: :label: rem-simplified-vs-full-final
5049: 
5050: | **Aspect** | **Simplified Model** (Doc 19) | **Full Model** (This Document) |
5051: |------------|-------------------------------|--------------------------------|
5052: | **Measurement** | $d_i = d(x_i)$ (position-only) | $d_i = d_{\text{alg}}(i, c(i))$ (companion-dependent) |
5053: | **Fitness Pipeline** | Single-stage | Six-stage: weights → mean → variance → std dev → Z-score → rescale |
5054: | **Walker Coupling** | None | N-body coupling via softmax companion selection |
5055: | **Proof Strategy** | Direct telescoping | Smooth clustering + partition of unity |
5056: | **Key Mechanism** | $\sum_j \nabla^m w_{ij} = 0$ | Same + exponential locality |
5057: | **Framework Assumptions** | None required | Minimum companion availability, uniform density |
5058: | **Regularity Class** | Gevrey-1 | Gevrey-1 (preserved through pipeline) |
5059: | **k-uniformity** | Immediate | Non-trivial (exponential localization + density bounds) |
5060: | **Document Length** | ~1,000 lines | ~2,000+ lines (full pipeline analysis) |
5061: | **Physical Realism** | Lower | Higher (true algorithmic model) |
hints.raw_directive:
5045: ## 16. Comparison to Simplified Model
5046: 
5047: :::{prf:remark} Simplified vs Full Model
5048: :label: rem-simplified-vs-full-final
5049: 
5050: | **Aspect** | **Simplified Model** (Doc 19) | **Full Model** (This Document) |
5051: |------------|-------------------------------|--------------------------------|
5052: | **Measurement** | $d_i = d(x_i)$ (position-only) | $d_i = d_{\text{alg}}(i, c(i))$ (companion-dependent) |
5053: | **Fitness Pipeline** | Single-stage | Six-stage: weights → mean → variance → std dev → Z-score → rescale |
5054: | **Walker Coupling** | None | N-body coupling via softmax companion selection |
5055: | **Proof Strategy** | Direct telescoping | Smooth clustering + partition of unity |
5056: | **Key Mechanism** | $\sum_j \nabla^m w_{ij} = 0$ | Same + exponential locality |
5057: | **Framework Assumptions** | None required | Minimum companion availability, uniform density |
5058: | **Regularity Class** | Gevrey-1 | Gevrey-1 (preserved through pipeline) |
5059: | **k-uniformity** | Immediate | Non-trivial (exponential localization + density bounds) |
5060: | **Document Length** | ~1,000 lines | ~2,000+ lines (full pipeline analysis) |
5061: | **Physical Realism** | Lower | Higher (true algorithmic model) |
